data.title: A Letter from Gordon Gund Regarding Carlos Boozer
data.meta_description: July 14th, 2004 To: Cavaliers FansFrom: Gordon Gund I know last weekâ€™s developments with respect to Carlos Boozer are a source of extreme disappointment for you. I want to assure you that I feel exactly the same way. Like you, I believed in Carlos. Several days have now gone by. This has helped me to gain perspective. I hope this letter will do the same for you.
